channel.title: Posts on INSPIRE Lab @ UCF
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on INSPIRE Lab @ UCF

item.title: INSPIRE LAB's poster on Distribution Network Reconfiguration with Decentralized Autonomous Electric Vehicles was in the finalist (top 6) of the poster competition at the 2018 INFORMS Annual Meeting.
Dr. Guo will present his work, collaborating with Sandia National Labs and UC Davis, on evolvement of charging infrastructure in a competitive and stochastic market at INFORMs 2018 in Phoenix.
